settings.title: Exchanges & Returns
settings.subtitle: We’re committed to making returns and exchanges simple, seamless, and sustainable.

settings.text:
Policy Overview

We offer a 30-day return window. You have 30 days from the date you receive your order to request a return.

Processing Fee

All returns are subject to a $10 processing fee, deducted from your refund.

Eligibility

To qualify for a return:

  • Items must be unworn, unused, and in their original packaging
  • Tags must still be attached
  • Receipt or proof of purchase is required

Start a Return

Return Process

If your return is approved, we’ll provide a prepaid shipping label and instructions.

Items sent back without a return request will not be accepted.

For questions, email us at CustomerCare@BDraddy.com.

Damages & Issues

Inspect your order upon delivery. Contact us immediately if an item is defective, damaged, or incorrect so we can resolve the issue.

Non-Returnable Items

We cannot accept returns on:

  • Perishables (food, flowers, plants)
  • Custom or personalized items
  • Personal care products (e.g., beauty items)
  • Hazardous materials, flammable liquids, or gases
  • Sale items or gift cards

European Union Customers

If your order ships to the EU, you have a 14-day right of withdrawal. You may cancel or return your order within 14 days for any reason. Items must meet the same eligibility requirements listed above.

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we’ll notify you of approval.

  • Approved refunds are issued to your original payment method within 10 business days.
  • Processing times vary depending on your bank or credit card company.
  • If 15+ business days have passed without your refund, contact us at CustomerCare@BDraddy.com.

settings.content:
B.Draddy will gladly accept returns or exchanges of any non custom-embroidered items purchased from bdraddy.com for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. 

B.Draddy cannot accept any returns or exchanges on international orders, including orders to Canada.

Please visit our Returns Page to obtain a return shipping label.

B.Draddy cannot accept any returns on boxers.

If you're unsure of your size or the fit of a garment, please reach out to our customer care team here or call (833) 511-0991

 B.Draddy cannot accept any returns or exchanges from other vendors who sell our product third party.

settings.text: To choose the right size, refer to our detailed size guide available on each product page. It includes measurements and tips for finding your perfect fit. If you have any specific questions, our customer service team is here to help.

settings.title: JOIN THE FAMILY
settings.text: Also known as the Brothers Draddy, B. Draddy looks to the past and its icons for inspiration while using the most modern design and fabric techniques. What began with a polo shirt over ten years ago has evolved into a full collection of luxe, lived-in essentials for the course, the clubhouse, the commute and beyond.
